translations.en:
: ** :interrobang: As you get ready to enter a forest, a mysterious woman explains there is a shorter path through the west.

:deciduous_tree: Keep going the same way.
:point_left: Follow the advice of the mysterious woman.
:point_right: Avoid the forest by going the opposite way you were told.

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*

translations.fr: ** | :deciduous_tree: Vous vous perdez pendant plusieurs heures dans la forÃªt mais finissez par en sortir sans dÃ©gats.
translations.en: ** | :deciduous_tree: You get lost for several hours in the forest but find your way out without damage.

translations.en: ** | :deciduous_tree: You waste a lot of time moving through the forest, but you finally succeed in crossing it! When you come out, you pick up an object that may be useful to you!

translations.en: ** | :deciduous_tree: You fall into a trap! After stealing all you possess, the thieves fly away, like cowards. Deeply hurt, you fall unconscious. :head_bandage:

translations.en: ** | :walking: You're not sure why you took a route 10 times longer than you originally planned, but you finally arrived at the right place.

translations.en: ** | :walking: After spending several minutes chatting with the mysterious woman you end up leaving. Following her directions, you arrive safely at the other end of the forest.
